overview: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her unhinged family.
tagline: On the fourth Thursday in November, 84 million American families will gather together... And wonder why.
cast: Holly Hunter|Robert Downey Jr.|Anne Bancroft|Charles Durning|Dylan McDermott
